Push Notification: Make smart choices off a menu [first_name]. Focus on fresh foods and avoid fried ones. Your body will thank you 😉
Pro tip: Don’t feel pressured to finish a dish if you’re full [first_name]. Pack it up and save it for later.
Veggies are the way to go! [first_name], save on calories by swapping out carbs for a fresh vegetable dish.
Be cautious with salads [first_name]. They can be healthy, but look out for dressings, cheeses, & fried toppings that are high in calories.
Salt may enhance your food but it’s not the healthiest option. Trade it in for fresh 🍋 and vinegar for flavor.
CTA: Use lemon and vinegar for flavor

Push Notification: Fiber first! Avoid spikes in your blood sugar by having fiber-friendly foods at the beginning of the meal 😉
When sharing dishes, always place your food on a plate. It’ll help you be mindful of your portions.
CTA: Place shared dishes on a plate

Push Notification: Don’t be shy, you can always ask to modify your dish when eating out. Put dressings on the side, or say no to butter & oil 💪
Look out for lean sources of protein off a menu such as boneless chicken, turkey, or fatty fish like salmon 💪
Fill up on veggies [first_name]. Keep an eye out for plant-based foods [first_name]. They aren’t just trendy, they can be super healthy too 🥕
[first_name], food labels can be tricky 🤔. Keep an eye out for products low in sugar, saturated fat & salts.
CTA: Read food labels carefully to choose healthy options.

Push Notification: Hi [first_name], keeping your pantry stocked with healthy items is easier than you think! Grains, beans & nuts will set you up for healthy meals 🥫
CTA: Stock your pantry with these healthy items to make meal prep easier.

Push Notification: Meal planning is everything! [first_name], try to plan dinners ahead to avoid last-minute fast foods.

Push Notification: Read the facts on your food [first_name]! As a rule of thumb - the fewer the ingredients the better 👌
CTA: Check the ingredients in your food to make sure they're healthy.

Push Notification: Did you ever notice that healthier food options are found around the perimeter of shops? Stick to the healthy area 💪

Push Notification: Craving fruit? Avoid the usual blood sugar spike by adding a handful of nuts to your meal 🍎🍌🥜
CTA: Add nuts to your fruit to balance your blood sugar.

Push Notification: Lean 🥩 or 🐟 are actually low in carbs & can be the source of your protein and omega-3’s.
CTA: Choose lean meat and fish for protein and omega-3s.

Push Notification: Whole grains are the real deal. Stock up on quinoa, brown rice and oats to add complex carbs to any meal.
CTA: Choose whole grains for complex carbs.

Push Notification: Map out your weekly menu [first_name] 🗺️. Plan your meals ahead of time to avoid stress while following a healthy diet.
